Change Log
==========================

1.0.2.2 (5/7/2021)
---------------------
- Bug Fixes

1.0.2 (5/6/2021)
---------------------
- Added support for updating multiple items (timer would update as one item)
- Added ability to adjust the "learning rate" of the timer
- Fixed bugs using "+=" (__iadd__) (caused timer to not work)

1.0.1.2 (5/6/2021)
---------------------
- Bug Fixes

1.0.0 (5/6/2021)
---------------------
- First Release
